summary: STEVENS DAEWOO 2225 MARINE BLVD N., JACKSONVILLE, NC 28540 910-455-1555. CONSUMER FEELS THAT THE FAILURE OF THE BRAKES WAS A RESULT OF THE RECALL. CONSUMER STATES BRAKE PEDAL WENT TO THE FLOOR.   DEALER HAD REFUSED TO CORRECT BRAKE HOSE PRIOR,  DUE TO PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION. TS
